alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:03PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Clay and southeastern Cass Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 403 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wild Rice, or 9 miles south of Fargo, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo, Moorhead, West Fargo, Dilworth, Horace, Mapleton and Reile`s Acres. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 51 and 70. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 336 and 352. Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
